comment: Queries the WifiManager for SSID of the current Wifi connection.

variables.name: mHasWifiPermission
variables.comment: Only valid when mHasWifiPermissionComputed is set.

variables.name: mWifiManager
variables.comment: Only valid when mHasWifiPermission is set.

methods.name: private boolean hasPermissionLocked()
methods.comment: Lazily determine if app has ACCESS_WIFI_STATE permission.

methods.name: private WifiInfo getWifiInfoLocked()
methods.comment: Fetches WifiInfo and records UMA for NullPointerExceptions.
